name: Perma-Fix Environmental Services, Inc.
description: Perma-Fix Environmental Services, Inc. is a leading provider of nuclear and hazardous waste management services. Founded in 1990 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, the company specializes in offering solutions for the treatment and disposal of radioactive and hazardous waste generated by various industries, including healthcare, government, and commercial sectors. Perma-Fix operates several treatment facilities across the United States, focusing on compliance with strict environmental regulations and safety standards. The company is committed to innovation and sustainability, utilizing advanced technologies to enhance waste processing and minimize environmental impact. Through its comprehensive services, Perma-Fix not only addresses waste management challenges but also contributes to public safety and environmental protection. With a dedicated team of experts and a strong emphasis on research and development, Perma-Fix is positioned as a trusted partner in the management of complex waste streams, ensuring safe and compliant disposal. The company's mission is to provide the highest quality of service while fostering a safe and healthy environment for future generations.
